characters.name: Lucie
characters.description: Lucie is a diverse contender who knows which brew makes you choke, heal or flee in fear. The arena has become her new playground for wild experiments.

ability1.name: Toxic Bolt
ability1.description: Projectile attack that deals 12 damage and inflicts Toxic.

ability2.name: Healing Potion
ability2.description: Throw a potion to target location that heals the nearest ally for 14 health and applies Revitalize.

ability3.name: Barrier
ability3.description: Grant a Shield to target ally. It absorbs up to 50 damage for 2.5s.

ability4.name: Clarity Potion
ability4.description: Throw a cleansing potion to target location, knocking nearby enemies away. The impact removes positive effects from enemies and negative effects from allies.

ability5.name: Panic Flask
ability5.description: Throw a chemical flask that deals 12 damage and inflicts Panic.

ability6.name: Roll
ability6.description: Roll forward and avoid incoming attacks.

ability7.name: Crippling Goo
ability7.description: Throw a vial of mixed chemicals to target location that deals 18 damage and inflicts Snare on impact. It covers the ground in a crippling goo that deals 80 damage and slows enemies over the duration.

battlerites.name: Weakening Toxin
battlerites.description: Toxic reduces incoming healing by 20% and outgoing damage by 10%.

battlerites.name: Vampiric Toxin
battlerites.description: Toxic heals you for 9 health over 6s.

battlerites.name: Companion Potion
battlerites.description: Healing Potion heals other allies for 4 bonus health.

battlerites.name: Blast Shield
battlerites.description: Applying Barrier causes a shockwave, dealing 10 damage to nearby enemies and knocking them back.

battlerites.name: Siege Barrier
battlerites.description: Barrier absorbs 8 bonus damage and duration increases by 0.5s.

battlerites.name: Potency
battlerites.description: Clarity Potion heals 10 health when removing a debuff and deals 10 damage when removing a buff.

battlerites.name: Hysteria
battlerites.description: Reduces the cooldown of Panic Flask by 1.5s. Direct hits further reduce the cooldown by 1.5s.

battlerites.name: Chaos
battlerites.description: Panic Flask explodes upon hitting an enemy, dealing 8 damage and inflicting Lesser Panic to other nearby enemies.

battlerites.name: Swift Roll
battlerites.description: Roll increases movement speed by 33% for 2.5s. Reduces cooldown of Roll by 3s.

battlerites.name: Sticky Goo
battlerites.description: Increases Snare factor of Crippling Goo from 35% to 60%.

battlerites.name: Dynamic Solution
battlerites.description: Increases max range and radius of Clarity Potion by 10%.
